violation.message: Dependency 'org.deeplearning4j:deeplearning4j-nn:jar' is declared multiple times with different versions (${project.version}, 0.8.0)
violation.description: Multiple dependencies, in <dependencies> or <managedDependencies>, with the same co-ordinates are reduntant, and can be confusing. If they have different versions, they can lead to unexpected behaviour.

violation.message: Dependency 'org.deeplearning4j:deeplearning4j-modelimport:jar' is declared multiple times with different versions (0.8.0, 0.8.0-2)
violation.description: Multiple dependencies, in <dependencies> or <managedDependencies>, with the same co-ordinates are reduntant, and can be confusing. If they have different versions, they can lead to unexpected behaviour.
